state migration point (smp).sysadmin: State Migration Point (SMP) refers to an SCCM log file, database object, automation script, or system role used to monitor endpoints, troubleshoot issues, and manage software deployment lifecycle.
state migration point (smp).use_case: An SCCM admin uses State Migration Point (SMP) to diagnose client issues, trigger actions remotely, or manage update and configuration compliance at scale.
